title: Episode 151: The Murdaugh Family Murders - Part 1
description:
For generations, a single family wielded control over the justice system of South Carolina’s Lowcountry. Over the past six years, five people with ties to the legendary family have been killed. Is this just a coincidence in a tight-knit community, or is there a more sinister explanation?
